name: Space Blaster (Random Ginger Guy)
description:
Proposed modifications - Planning on doing some combination of: UI visual changes, custom level music, boss alien, sprite changes, additional player abilities, or additional obstacles.  

Current level modifications are highly experimental and will be modified for the final version.  They are:

-black hole, which has asteroids orbiting it

-'boss' alien with some custom features (modified projectiles, destructible guns, etc)

-modified player firing abilities on each level (1st level is generic firing, 2nd level features a laser, 3rd level features a 'machine gun')
